org.gvsig.fmap.mapcontext.rendering.legend

Interface DrawingObservable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBarsChartLegend, IChartLegend, IClassifiedVectorLegend, ILinkedChartLegend, IPieChartLegend, ISingleSymbolLegend, IVectorialIntervalLegend, IVectorialUniqueValueLegend, IVectorLegend, VectorComplexLegend
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClassifiedVectorLegend, AbstractIntervalLegend, AbstractVectorialLegend, BarsChartLegend, DefaultVectorComplexLegend, LegendControl, LinkedChartLegend, PieChartLegend, SingleSymbolLegend, VectorialIntervalLegend, VectorialUniqueValueLegend

    public interface DrawingObservable
    Interface for observable drawing operations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDrawingObserver(Observer observer)
      Adds a new Observer.
      void deleteDrawingObserver(Observer observer)
      Deletes a registered drawing Observer from the list of registered ones.
      void deleteDrawingObservers()
      Deletes all the registered drawing Observer objects.

    • Method Detail

        void deleteDrawingObserver(Observer observer)
        Deletes a registered drawing Observer from the list of registered ones.
        Parameters:
        observer - to delete from the registered ones

      • deleteDrawingObservers

        void deleteDrawingObservers()
        Deletes all the registered drawing Observer objects.
